verses.verse: And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> in the land <S%H776><s%> wherein his father <S%H1><s%> was a stranger <S%H4033><s%>, in the land <S%H776><s%> of Kanahan <S%H3667><s%>.

These are the generations <S%H8435><s%> of Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%>. Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, being seventeen <S%H6240><s%> <S%H7651><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> old <S%H1121><s%>, was feeding <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the flock <S%H6629><s%> with his brethren <S%H251><s%>; and the lad <S%H5288><s%> was with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bilhah <S%H1090><s%>, and with the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zilpah <S%H2153><s%>, his father's <S%H1><s%> wives <S%H802><s%>: and Yosef <S%H3130><s%> brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> unto his father <S%H1><s%> their evil <S%H7451><s%> report <S%H1681><s%>.

Now Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> Yosef <S%H3130><s%> more than all his children <S%H1121><s%>, because he was the son <S%H1121><s%> of his old age <S%H2208><s%>: and he made <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him a coat <S%H3801><s%> of many colours <S%H6446><s%>.

And when his brethren <S%H251><s%> saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> that their father <S%H1><s%> loved <S%H157><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him more than all his brethren <S%H251><s%>, they hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and could <S%H3201><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not speak <S%H1696><s%> <S%H8763><s%> peaceably <S%H7965><s%> unto him.

And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> dreamed <S%H2492><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%>, and he told <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it his brethren <S%H251><s%>: and they hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him yet the more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%>.
And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Hear <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray you, this dream <S%H2472><s%> which I have dreamed <S%H2492><s%> <S%H8804><s%>:

For, behold, we were binding <S%H481><s%> <S%H8764><s%> <S%H8432><s%> sheaves <S%H485><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>, and, lo, my sheaf <S%H485><s%> arose <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and also stood upright <S%H5324><s%> <S%H8738><s%>; and, behold, your sheaves <S%H485><s%> stood round about <S%H5437><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and made obeisance <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8691><s%> to my sheaf <S%H485><s%>.

And his brethren <S%H251><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to him, Shalt thou indeed <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8800><s%> reign <S%H4427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over us? or shalt thou indeed <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8800><s%> have dominion <S%H4910><s%> <S%H8799><s%> over us? And they hated <S%H8130><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him yet the more <S%H3254><s%> <S%H8686><s%> for his dreams <S%H2472><s%>, and for his words <S%H1697><s%>.

And he dreamed <S%H2492><s%> <S%H8799><s%> yet another <S%H312><s%> dream <S%H2472><s%>, and told <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Behold, I have dreamed <S%H2492><s%> <S%H8804><s%> a dream <S%H2472><s%> more; and, behold, the sun <S%H8121><s%> and the moon <S%H3394><s%> and the eleven <S%H6240><s%> <S%H259><s%> stars <S%H3556><s%> made obeisance <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8693><s%> to me.

And he told <S%H5608><s%> <S%H8762><s%> it to his father <S%H1><s%>, and to his brethren <S%H251><s%>: and his father <S%H1><s%> rebuked <S%H1605><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto him, What is this dream <S%H2472><s%> that thou hast dreamed <S%H2492><s%> <S%H8804><s%>? Shall I and thy mother <S%H517><s%> and thy brethren <S%H251><s%> indeed <S%H935><s%> <S%H8800><s%> come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to bow down <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8692><s%> ourselves to thee to the earth <S%H776><s%> ?
And his brethren <S%H251><s%> envied <S%H7065><s%> <S%H8762><s%> him; but his father <S%H1><s%> observed <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the saying <S%H1697><s%>.
And his brethren <S%H251><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8800><s%> their father's <S%H1><s%> flock <S%H6629><s%> in SH'khem <S%H7927><s%>.

And Yisra'EL <S%H3478><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto Yosef <S%H3130><s%>, Do not thy brethren <S%H251><s%> feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> the flock in SH'khem <S%H7927><s%>? come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and I will send thee <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them. And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to him, Here am I.

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to him, Go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, I pray thee, see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8798><s%> whether it be well <S%H7965><s%> with thy brethren <S%H251><s%>, and well <S%H7965><s%> with the flocks <S%H6629><s%>; and bring <S%H7725><s%> me word <S%H1697><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8685><s%>. So he sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him out of the vale <S%H6010><s%> of Hevron <S%H2275><s%>, and he came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to SH'khem <S%H7927><s%>.

And a certain man <S%H376><s%> found him <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and, behold, he was wandering <S%H8582><s%> <S%H8802><s%> in the field <S%H7704><s%>: and the man <S%H376><s%> asked him <S%H7592><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, saying <S%H559><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, What seekest <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thou?

And he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, I seek <S%H1245><s%> <S%H8764><s%> my brethren <S%H251><s%>: tell <S%H5046><s%> <S%H8685><s%> me, I pray thee, where <S%H375><s%> they feed <S%H7462><s%> <S%H8802><s%> their flocks.

And the man <S%H376><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, They are departed <S%H5265><s%> <S%H8804><s%> hence <S%H2088><s%>; for I heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8802><s%>, Let us go <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to Dothan <S%H1886><s%>. And Yosef <S%H3130><s%> went <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8799><s%> after <S%H310><s%> his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> them in Dothan <S%H1886><s%>.

And when they saw <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him afar off <S%H7350><s%>, even before he came near <S%H7126><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, they conspired <S%H5230><s%> <S%H8691><s%> against him to slay <S%H4191><s%> <S%H8687><s%> him.
And they said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> one <S%H376><s%> to another <S%H251><s%>, Behold, this <S%H1976><s%> dreamer <S%H1167><s%> <S%H2472><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%>.

Come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%> now therefore, and let us slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him into some <S%H259><s%> pit <S%H953><s%>, and we will say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, Some evil <S%H7451><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him: and we shall see <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%> what will become of his dreams <S%H2472><s%>.

And Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> it, and he delivered <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him out of their hands <S%H3027><s%>; and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, Let us not kill <S%H5221><s%> <S%H8686><s%> <S%H5315><s%> him.

And Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto them, Shed <S%H8210><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no blood <S%H1818><s%>, but cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8685><s%> him into this pit <S%H953><s%> that is in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, and lay <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8799><s%> no hand <S%H3027><s%> upon him; that he might rid <S%H5337><s%> <S%H8687><s%> him out of their hands <S%H3027><s%>, to deliver <S%H7725><s%> him to his father <S%H1><s%> again <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8687><s%>.

And it came to pass, when Yosef <S%H3130><s%> was come <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, that they stript <S%H6584><s%> <S%H8686><s%> <S%H853><s%> Yosef <S%H3130><s%> out of <S%H854><s%> his coat <S%H3801><s%>, his coat <S%H3801><s%> of many colours <S%H6446><s%> that was on him;

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him, and cast <S%H7993><s%> <S%H8686><s%> him into a pit <S%H953><s%>: and the pit <S%H953><s%> was empty <S%H7386><s%>, there was no water <S%H4325><s%> in it.

And they sat down <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8800><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%>: and they lifted up <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8799><s%> their eyes <S%H5869><s%> and looked <S%H7200><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and, behold, a company <S%H736><s%> of Ishmeelites <S%H3459><s%> came <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> from Gil`ad <S%H1568><s%> with their camels <S%H1581><s%> bearing <S%H5375><s%> <S%H8802><s%> spicery <S%H5219><s%> and balm <S%H6875><s%> and myrrh <S%H3910><s%>, going <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8802><s%> to carry it down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8687><s%> to Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Y'hudah <S%H3063><s%> said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, What profit <S%H1215><s%> is it if we slay <S%H2026><s%> <S%H8799><s%> our brother <S%H251><s%>, and conceal <S%H3680><s%> <S%H8765><s%> his blood <S%H1818><s%> ?

Come <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8798><s%>, and let us sell <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8799><s%> him to the Ishmeelites <S%H3459><s%>, and let not our hand <S%H3027><s%> be upon him; for he is our brother <S%H251><s%> and our flesh <S%H1320><s%>. And his brethren <S%H251><s%> were content <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

Then there passed <S%H5674><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by Midianites <S%H4084><s%> merchantmen <S%H582><s%> <S%H5503><s%> <S%H8802><s%>; and they drew <S%H4900><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and lifted up <S%H5927><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Yosef <S%H3130><s%> out of the pit <S%H953><s%>, and sold <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yosef <S%H3130><s%> to the Ishmeelites <S%H3459><s%> for twenty <S%H6242><s%> pieces of silver <S%H3701><s%>: and they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> Yosef <S%H3130><s%> into Egypt <S%H4714><s%>.

And Re'uven <S%H7205><s%> returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the pit <S%H953><s%>; and, behold, Yosef <S%H3130><s%> was not in the pit <S%H953><s%>; and he rent <S%H7167><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his clothes <S%H899><s%>.

And he returned <S%H7725><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto his brethren <S%H251><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, The child <S%H3206><s%> is not; and I, whither <S%H575><s%> shall I go <S%H935><s%> <S%H8802><s%> ?

And they took <S%H3947><s%> <S%H8799><s%> Yosef's <S%H3130><s%> coat <S%H3801><s%>, and killed <S%H7819><s%> <S%H8799><s%> a kid <S%H8163><s%> of the goats <S%H5795><s%>, and dipped <S%H2881><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the coat <S%H3801><s%> in the blood <S%H1818><s%>;

And they sent <S%H7971><s%> <S%H8762><s%> the coat <S%H3801><s%> of many colours <S%H6446><s%>, and they brought <S%H935><s%> <S%H8686><s%> it to their father <S%H1><s%>; and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, This have we found <S%H4672><s%> <S%H8804><s%>: know <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8685><s%> now whether it be thy son's <S%H1121><s%> coat <S%H3801><s%> or no.

And he knew it <S%H5234><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, It is my son's <S%H1121><s%> coat <S%H3801><s%>; an evil <S%H7451><s%> beast <S%H2416><s%> hath devoured <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him; Yosef <S%H3130><s%> is without doubt <S%H2963><s%> <S%H8800><s%> rent in pieces <S%H2963><s%> <S%H8776><s%>.

And Ya`akov <S%H3290><s%> rent <S%H7167><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his clothes <S%H8071><s%>, and put <S%H7760><s%> <S%H8799><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> upon his loins <S%H4975><s%>, and mourned <S%H56><s%> <S%H8691><s%> for his son <S%H1121><s%> many <S%H7227><s%> days <S%H3117><s%>.

And all his sons <S%H1121><s%> and all his daughters <S%H1323><s%> rose up <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to comfort <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8763><s%> him; but he refused <S%H3985><s%> <S%H8762><s%> to be comforted <S%H5162><s%> <S%H8692><s%>; and he said <S%H559><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, For I will go down <S%H3381><s%> <S%H8799><s%> into the grave <S%H7585><s%> unto my son <S%H1121><s%> mourning <S%H57><s%>. Thus his father <S%H1><s%> wept <S%H1058><s%> <S%H8799><s%> for him.

And the Midianites <S%H4092><s%> sold <S%H4376><s%> <S%H8804><s%> him into Egypt <S%H4714><s%> unto Potiphar <S%H6318><s%>, an officer <S%H5631><s%> of Pharaoh's <S%H6547><s%>, and captain <S%H8269><s%> of the guard <S%H2876><s%>.
